name: auto-backup
description: Automatic cloud backup with version history. Works like Google Sheets autosave.

commands.title: Auto Backup: Open Menu (View Status, Sync Now, Settings)

autoBackup.enabled.description: Enable automatic backup and cloud sync. Disable to pause all backup operations.

autoBackup.versionInterval.description: Time in milliseconds after last change before saving a version. Default: 30 seconds (30000ms). Only saves when files actually change.

autoBackup.cloudInterval.description: How often to automatically sync to your remote repository (cloud backup)

enumDescriptions: Automatic: Saves versions and syncs to cloud automatically (recommended)
Manual: Saves versions locally only. Click 'Sync now' to push to cloud.

autoBackup.ignorePatterns.description: Files and folders to exclude from backup (glob patterns). node_modules is always excluded.

autoBackup.logLevel.description: Activity log detail level. Use 'debug' for troubleshooting, 'warn' for normal use.
